_comment: CRITICAL: This file is loaded at runtime by the frontend. When publishing to live via the Caffeine editor, CANISTER_ID_BACKEND MUST be replaced with your actual backend canister ID. The placeholder value 'PLACEHOLDER_BACKEND_CANISTER_ID' will cause connection failures and prevent the app from functioning. The Caffeine editor should automatically replace this during the publish process. Build metadata fields (BUILD_VERSION, BUILD_TIMESTAMP, DEPLOYMENT_ID) are optional and can be injected by the deployment system.
